summary: This bill, S. 654, aims to improve the Department of Veterans Affairs' (VA) scheduling process for veterans' care within the Veterans Community Care Program. It establishes a national External Provider Scheduling Program to enable VA schedulers to view and schedule appointments with external healthcare providers in real-time. The bill mandates the Secretary to utilize existing contracts or establish new ones and requires the program to reduce wait times for appointments. The Secretary is to submit annual reports on the program's progress.
